_header: As I stood on a day me self under a tree
_description: A Love Song — thirty-one lines in three irregular stanzas

CollArmsAr27.First Lines:
As I stod on a day me self under a treI met in a morueninge a
                    may in a medewe…
CollArmsAr27.Last Lines:
…It is non ned to makn it so towwith a riwet ye wat I
                    redewend fort þere ye wenin bett for to spede
CollArmsAr27.Note:
Conlee (1991)
XConlee,  John W. 
             Middle English Debate Poetry: A Critical Anthology.
         East Lansing, MI: Colleagues Press, 1991 (300) notes that this is on the endleaf of MS
                    27.
